resources.string: 1. What kind of restaurants are listed on Give Me Bread?
2. Why are not you delivering to my area yet?
3. Can I place a take away order as well?
4. How much do you charge for delivery fee?
5. How far do you deliver from your partnered restaurant?
We have more than 70+ top restaurants listed. Our restaurants are throughout Christchurch and offer multiple cuisine options including Thai, Chinese, Indian and so on. You name it, we have it!
In order to keep the food fresh and hot, we deliver up to 7-8 km from our partnered restaurant. We are expanding rapidly and we will be delivering in your area very soon.
Yes you can place take away order at no extra cost and pick it up whenever you want. Just select takeaway option after clicking on order now button.
We charge a fixed delivery fee of $5.99 (up to 4 km) and $1 per additional km over 4 kms.
We deliver up to 7-8 km from our partnered restaurant which is almost double the distance as compared to other delivery companies.
